B

BaseActionProvider - Class in org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project
Action provider which was originally written for J2SE project and later refactored here so that other EE project types requiring handling of Java related actions can reuse and extend it.
BaseActionProvider(Project, UpdateHelper, PropertyEvaluator, SourceRoots, SourceRoots, AntProjectHelper, BaseActionProvider.Callback) - Constructor for class org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project.BaseActionProvider
 
BaseActionProvider.Callback - Interface in org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project
Callback for accessing project private data.
BaseActionProvider.Callback2 - Interface in org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project
Callback for accessing project private data and supporting ant invocation hooks.
BaseActionProvider.Callback3 - Interface in org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project
Callback for accessing project private data and supporting ant invocation hooks.
BaseActionProvider.CallbackImpl - Class in org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project
